ruleBookInfo.author:
li:matches(作者)@text||
p:matches(作者)@text||
div:not(:has(div)):matches(作者)@text
##作者：|简介.*
ruleBookInfo.intro:
li:matches(简介)@all||
p:matches(简介)@all||
div:not(:has(div)):matches(简介)@all
ruleBookInfo.name: title@text##\(.*|_.*|-.*|最新.*|无弹窗.*|完整.*|\:.*|全集.*|全文.*|免费.*|章节.*|免费.*|小说.*|,.*|txt.*

ruleSearch.author: class.b_attribution@text
ruleSearch.bookList: @css:ol#b_results>li:not(:matches(百度百科|游戏|Douban|相关搜索|douban|电视剧|没有找到|未找到|微信|哔哩哔哩))
ruleSearch.name: h2@text##\(.*|_.*|-.*|最新.*|无弹窗.*|完整.*|\:.*|全集.*|全文.*|免费.*|章节.*|免费.*|小说.*|,.*|txt.*

ruleToc.chapterList: @css:div:containsOwn(章)>a,*:has(>ul):matches(第|章|Chapter)>ul a:not(:matches(返回|直达|上一页|下一页)),*:not(:has(div)):has(>*:has(>a)):matches(第|章|Chapter) a:not(:matches(返回|直达|上一页|下一页))
